noVersionsFoundDesc: Download a PHP version (from the official site) and extract the folder here.
statusSwitchSuccess: PHP {version} is now active! Please restart your terminal to see the changes.
statusSwitchError: Failed to set PATH. Try running as Administrator.
statusIniLoadError: Could not find or create a php.ini for version {version}.
helpStep1: 1. Download the desired PHP version (NTS x64 Zip) from the official website.
helpStep2: 2. Extract the entire folder from the .zip file into the application's versions folder.
helpStep3: 3. Make sure the folder name is simple (e.g., 'php-8.2.5') and that 'php.exe' is directly inside it.
helpStep4: 4. Click the 'Update' button in the application to see the new version listed.
appSettingsAutoStart: Launch PHPShift when you log on
appSettingsAutoStartDescription: Automatically start the application in the system tray.
externalVersionWarning: An external PHP version is currently active in your system's PATH. Selecting a version below will take precedence.
